Description.Text:
Built in two blocks with the pool area and outdoor restaurant in between, the hotel also has a grassed seating area with cushions and a few hammocks. Renovated in 2010, the air-conditioned beach hotel offers 71 rooms in total and welcomes guests in a lobby with 24-hour reception and check-out services, safety deposit boxes (extra fee) and currency exchange facilities. Further facilities include a bar, WLAN Internet access and a car park.

Located approximately 700 metres from the beautiful beach at Ölüdeniz, the hotel is situated towards the back of the resort in an elevated position, providing stunning views down the valley to the sea. Local transport is available from the main road, approximately 100m away. Guests will find shops, restaurants, bars and nightlife a 10-15 minute walk away in Ölüdeniz. Fethiye and its bus station is around a 20-minute drive from the hotel, the old Greek village of Kayaköy is 8 km away and Dalaman Airport is approximately 65 km away.

The rooms are pleasantly furnished with tiled or laminated floors, and each has individually regulated air conditioning and heating, wall mounted TVs and a minibar (extra charge). The bathrooms have shower cabins and a hairdryer. Each room additionally features a double bed or twin bed, direct dial telephone, tea & coffee making facilities and a private balcony or terrace.

The hotel has a large outdoor swimming pool with separate children's swimming area and a sunbathing terrace with sun loungers and parasols laid out ready for use. There is also a poolside bar providing drinks and table tennis and darts. Occasional light animation is provided. Sun loungers and parasols can be hired for a fee on the nearby sandy and pebble beaches.

* Some services at an extra charge

All Inclusive in 2013 will be 24 hours.

Room type: 20 Double Rooms. - 30 Triple Rooms – 9 Family  Rooms – 12 Rooms with a terrace

In all Rooms:Satallite , Plasma TV, Telephone, Minibar (bottle of water, fizzy water, coke, sprite, fanta), Safe box(free), Air conditioning, Bathroom (shower) & WC, Hairdryer, Kettle and tea and coffee.

Room with Terrace: This room is all inclusive with the following in the  mini bar; Water, Cola, Sprite, Fanta, Fizzy water, Beer.

Safe box will be included free of charge. Every day bedding and towels will be changed. In the terrace room chair , unbrella, sunbed. Slippers, shampoo, conditoner shower gel, soap, toothbrush and a shower cap will be provided.                                                                                                                                                                                               
Housekeeping: Everyday your room will be cleaned, every 2 days towels will be changed and every 3 days bedding will be changed.

Facilities: Outdoor pool, Childrens pool, Table tennis, Darts,Chequers, Chess and Back gammon.

Activities: Water polo, Darts tournament, Table tennis tournament, Beach Volley, Wireless internet, some entertainment three nights a week  we provide a show. Open play area for children ages 4-12 years 10.00–12:00/14:00–18.00. Beach shuttle free of charge daily. Beach towels provided.

Board                                      :All inclusive (24 Hours)

Board details                        :All main meals are open buffet.

For Early checkout              :Early breakfast or packed lunch and for late check in plate or sandwich

Breakfast                               :Main Restaurant           07:00 – 09:30     (open buffet)

Late Breakfast                  :Main Restaurant        09:30 – 10:30   (open buffet)

Lunch                                     :Main Restaurant          12:30 – 14:00      (open buffet)

Dinner                                    :Main Restaurant          19:00 – 21:30      (open buffet)

Ottoman’s A’la Carte        :Restaurant/Terrace  19:00 – 21:30  

Once a week ( Min. 7 days accomodations)

Snack                                     :Terrace/Restaurant  13:00 – 17:00 / 22:00 – 00:00  

Supper Menu                    :Restaurant/Terrace  00:00 – 01:00

Ice cream                              :Restaurant/Terrace  11:00 – 12:00 / 15:00 – 16:00

Tea and cake                        :Restaurant/Terrace  17:00 – 18:00                   

Room service                        :                                        07:00 – 21:00      (Extra)

Restaurant and Bars          

:Terrace Bar               14:00 – 17:00           Unlimited local drinks

:Pool Bar                     08:00 – 00:00           Unlimited local drinks

:Main Restaurant      (On buffet times)     Unlimited local drinks

:Garden Bar            00:00 – 08:00        Unlimited  local drinks

:A’la Carte             19:00 – 21:30         (Extra)

:All drinks will be served to the customers.

Extra Facilities                           :Telephone, Laudry, Room   service, Imported Drinks, Turkish coffee , Energy drinks, Fresh fruit juices, Shop and Doctor.

RoomType.text: Superior Room With Terrace Sea View Free Air Conditioning

Message.Text:
Room 1
Check in time: 2pmCheck out time: 12pmRates are valid for all markets except Germany , CIS and Local (Turkey) markets.The published prices are based on Customers Residing in and/or Travelling from the country in which they booked their accommodation / holiday. Non-residents may incur additional charges on check-in depending on their country of residence as detailed in the booking conditions/notes. Proof of residency may be required.
Notice
Please be aware of some important changes to the visa application to Turkey. Implementation of a new e-visa process for Turkey, as advised by the Turkish Consulate that the stamp / sticker visa on arrival will be abolished from 10th April 2014 and will be completely replaced by the e-visa application process. All visitors to Turkey from 11th April 2014 will be required to purchase their entry visa via the Turkish Government website www.evisa.gov.tr prior to travel. In accordance with the new Law on Foreigners, the practice of obtaining visas upon arrival to points of entry to Turkey will begin to come to an end as of 11 April 2014. However, border authorities will maintain existing procedures for a certain transitional period, to include the 2014 tourism season. Fees for e-Visas obtained via the e-Visa website (www.evisa.gov.tr) will be lower than the fees for visas obtained upon arrival to Turkish airports. Information regarding visa fees can be found on the website of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs (http://www.mfa.gov.tr/data/KONSOLOSLUK/vize-harc-miktarlari-en.pdf). Currently the price for the e-visa is $20 per person.


From October 29, 2018, self-service e-visa kiosks and Wi-Fi areas where visitors can apply for an e-Visa on arrival will no longer be available in Turkish airports; please note that visitors to Turkey will have to apply for e-visas in advance
